channel.title: Scape-DM | 2006 Deadman Mode
channel.description:
[CENTER][FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=7][I]S C A P E - D M[/I][/SIZE] [SIZE=1]Official logo being created soon.[/SIZE]
[SIZE=5][U]About Us:[/U][/SIZE] [SIZE=4]Formally known as Scape-2006, a remake of the 2006 era, developer [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/venn/"]Venn[/URL] has come to relive the era with a twist: Deadman style! Many things from the previous server have been tweaked a bit so that the gameplay is even more fun in this dangerous world. Since we are still in project mode, and many things are still in the developing stages, we'd like to ask you what you'd like to see in Scape-DM! The server, in the future, may not be strictly 2006 styled. All 474 loading items will be polled and voted by the community.[/SIZE]
[SIZE=5][U]Features:[/U] [/SIZE] [SIZE=4]- Safe Zone Guards - EXP Counter - Scroll Wheel Support - Custom Bank Key Interface - Safety Deposit Boxes - PJ Timer - 100% Safe Zones, Multi-Combat Zones, 1v1 Combat Locations - Bonus Rewards in Wilderness - Five Minute Grace Period - 40 Fully Operational Quests - Perfected Skilling - So Much More![/SIZE] [SIZE=5] [U]The Wilderness:[/U][/SIZE] [SIZE=4]With the gamemode making the world almost entirely PvP zones, the Wilderness is something that we wanted to keep being more dangerous. With being inside of the wilderness, players will have more risk and reward. There will provide more skilling areas, increased EXP and item rewards, and better drops from high-level monsters. Players PKing inside the Wilderness will not receive a skull penalty for safe zones, and cannot protect item, as well as an additional 25,000 coins per kill. These features may be changed in the upcoming future.[/SIZE]
[SIZE=5][U]Media:[/U][/SIZE] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/4632a3641682f06134bdcd5fba9f52e0.gif[/img] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/994a299c4cfb893ea2b507f57c824c88.gif[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/mDn1L/d55ff381a9.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/mDF82/92dc5e4ebd.png[/img]
[SIZE=5][U]Credits:[/U][/SIZE] [SIZE=4]- 2006Scape - 06Prime - Paradox[/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER]

item.title: Scape-DM | 2006 Deadman Mode
item.dc:creator: @Vesgar Vesgar
item.description:
@Vesgar wrote:

[CENTER][FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=7]S C A P E - D M[/SIZE]
[SIZE=1]Official logo being created soon.[/SIZE]

[SIZE=5]About Us:[/SIZE]
[SIZE=4]Formally known as Scape-2006, a remake of the 2006 era, developer Venn has come to relive the era with a twist: Deadman style! Many things from the previous server have been tweaked a bit so that the gameplay is even more fun in this dangerous world. Since we are still in project mode, and many things are still in the developing stages, we’d like to ask you what you’d like to see in Scape-DM! The server, in the future, may not be strictly 2006 styled. All 474 loading items will be polled and voted by the community.[/SIZE]

[SIZE=5]Features: [/SIZE]
[SIZE=4]- Safe Zone Guards

  • EXP Counter
  • Scroll Wheel Support
  • Custom Bank Key Interface
  • Safety Deposit Boxes
  • PJ Timer
  • 100% Safe Zones, Multi-Combat Zones, 1v1 Combat Locations
  • Bonus Rewards in Wilderness
  • Five Minute Grace Period
  • 40 Fully Operational Quests
  • Perfected Skilling
  • So Much More![/SIZE]
    [SIZE=5]
    The Wilderness:[/SIZE]
    [SIZE=4]With the gamemode making the world almost entirely PvP zones, the Wilderness is something that we wanted to keep being more dangerous. With being inside of the wilderness, players will have more risk and reward. There will provide more skilling areas, increased EXP and item rewards, and better drops from high-level monsters. Players PKing inside the Wilderness will not receive a skull penalty for safe zones, and cannot protect item, as well as an additional 25,000 coins per kill. These features may be changed in the upcoming future.[/SIZE]

[SIZE=5]Media:[/SIZE]

994a299c4cfb893ea2b507f57c824c88.gif760×500


[SIZE=5]Credits:[/SIZE]
[SIZE=4]- 2006Scape

  • Paradox[/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER]
